thread.title: Marnie MacKay
thread.title_full: Exclusive Offer Club reviewed by Marnie MacKay

author: Marnie MacKay
title: Marnie MacKay
text: I highly recommend purchasing from Joe. This is what happened: I sent Joe an email, He got back to me immediately. We spoke over the phone to make the purchase - Joe answered any questions I had without hesitation, and supplied me with all the information I needed in order to purchase and install the CS6 Master Collection. While downloading the files and installing the software, Joe was available to guide me through each step - He made sure I was completely set up, then followed up with me a couple of days later to ask if I was satisfied with the product! EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE, and the product is amazing! Thank you so much Joe!
